content.prompt: The architect’s choice to use primarily mud brick to build the Great Mosque of Djenné resulted in which of the following?

choices.label: Higher ceilings that required no buttressing
Easier alignment of elements toward Mecca
Thicker walls that provided a natural defense
Softer exterior surfaces that needed periodic replastering

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
